visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: The chart title should be 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The axes and labels should have a dark gray color with a font size of 12px. The data series should include one series named 'Rainfall' with the provided monthly data. The custom colors should be a gradient from blue to green. Additional configurations include setting the chart margins to 50 pixels, a white background, and a legend positioned at the bottom of the chart.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart has a white background and a margin of 50 pixels. The x-axis and y-axis labels, as well as the title, are styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 12px. The data series includes one series named 'Rainfall' with monthly data points. The series uses a custom color gradient from blue to green. Additionally, the legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart, centered horizontally.
